articles.title: Plunging demand for COVID-19 tests may leave US exposed - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Just five weeks ago, Los Angeles County was conducting more than 350,000 weekly coronavirus tests, including at a massive drive-thru site at Dodger Stadium, as health workers raced to contain the worst COVID-19 hotspot in the U.S.

articles.author: Herb Scribner
articles.title: COVID symptoms decline after mass vaccine distribution, study says - Deseret News
articles.description: Data from Israel — which vaccinated its elderly population — has found that mass vaccinations have helped stop severe COVID-19.
articles.content:
Data from Israel which has been vaccinating its elderly population in recent weeks suggests that mass vaccination can stop the spread of severe COVID-19 symptoms, CNBC reports.
